concept.title: Graphics Composition Collection
concept.shortdesc: The Graphics Composition collection is a key part of ScreenPlay. The collection is made up of components that are concerned with composition. This is the process of putting together the output elements from various different sources to create the display that the viewer sees on the screen.

conbody.p: Variant: ScreenPlay. Target audience: Device creators.

This section is aimed at device creators and system implementers. Although some of the overview material may be of general interest to application developers, graphics composition is handled internally and is not of direct relevance to normal application development.
